resource_data:

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103369</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Cremation of Sam McGee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Verbrennung von SAM McGee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'incinération du SAM McGee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A cremação de Sam McGee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La cremazione del SAM McGee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Cremation του SAM McGee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cremación de SAM McGee</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A videographical presentation of the poem by Robert Service, with subtle sound effects to enhance mood.  Video and sound quality are primitive.  This video has been used in classrooms as a teaching adjunct to the poetry of Robert Service, and has drawn compliments from the teachers involved.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine videographical Darstellung des Gedichtes 
durch Robert Service, mit den subtilen stichhaltigen Effekten, zum von
von Stimmung zu erhöhen. Video und stichhaltige Qualität sind 
ursprünglich. Dieser Bildschirm ist in den Klassenzimmern als 
unterrichtender Anhang zur Poesie des Robert Services benutzt worden, 
und hat Komplimente von den betroffenen Lehrern gezeichnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation videographical de la poésie par
Robert Service, avec des effets sains subtiles pour mettre en valeur 
l'humeur. La qualité visuelle et de son sont primitive. 
Ce vidéo a été utilisé dans les salles de classe comme 
complément d'enseignement à la poésie du service de Robert, et a 
tiré des compliments des professeurs impliqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação videographical do poema por 
Robert Serviço, com os efeitos sadios subtle para realçar o modo. 
A qualidade video e sadia é primitiva. Este vídeo foi 
usado nas salas de aula como um adjunct ensinando à poesia do 
serviço de Robert, e desenhou elogios dos professores envolvidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione videographical del poem da 
Robert Service, con gli effetti sani sottili per aumentare umore. 
La video e qualità sana è primitiva. Questo video è 
stato utilizzato in aule come aggiunta d'istruzione alla poesia di 
servizio del Robert ed ha dissipato i complimenti dagli insegnanti in 
causa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια videographical παρουσίαση του ποιήματος Robert
Service, με τα λεπτά υγιή αποτελέσματα για να ενισχύσει τη 
διάθεση. Η ποιότητα βίντεο και ήχου είναι πρωτόγονη. 
Αυτό το βίντεο έχει χρησιμοποιηθεί στις τάξεις ως προσθήκη
διδασκαλίας στην ποίηση Robert Service, και έχει σύρει τις 
φιλοφρονήσεις από τους δασκάλους σχετικούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación videographical del poema de 
Roberto Service, con los efectos sonoros sutiles para realzar humor. 
La calidad video y de sonido es primitiva. Este vídeo se 
ha utilizado en salas de clase como adjunto de enseñanza a la poesía
del servicio de Roberto, y ha trazado elogios de los profesores 
implicados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:POEM BY ROBERT SERVICE.  NARRATION AND PRODUCTION BY URGELT.
FN:POEM BY ROBERT SERVICE.  NARRATION AND PRODUCTION BY URGELT.
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
